articles.title: LG bags top honours at inaugural IFA awards
articles.author: Oluwakemi Abimbola
articles.summary: LG Electronics won 17 awards at IFA 2025, including Best of IFA for the LG Signature OLED T, the world's first wireless transparent TV. Other recognized products include LG Spielraum with AI-powered cabin, LG Comfort Kit with inclusive design, and AI Sense Clean Dishwasher with Microplastic Filter, among others, showcasing LG's commitment to innovation.

articles.title: Say hello to the new BLUE CAMP: The Metro Stores' signature fashion brand gets a bold refresh
articles.summary: Metro Stores has relaunched its in-house fashion brand, Blue Camp, with a new look, bolder designs, and modern identity. The collection includes versatile styles and everyday essentials for men, women, and kids. The new Blue Camp is available at all Metro Stores nationwide and online.

articles.title: I Tried Walmart's King Krumb vs. Crumbl Cookies To See Which One Is Better
articles.author: Krista Marshall
articles.summary: Walmart introduced "King Krumb" cookies, available in their bakery. These cookies are being directly compared to Crumbl cookies in a head-to-head taste test to determine which is better.

articles.title: I Tried Walmart's King Krumb vs. Crumbl Cookies To See Which One Is Better
articles.author: Krista Marshall
articles.summary: Walmart introduced King Krumb cookies in its bakery, which are similar to Crumbl cookies. A taste test was conducted to compare the two brands.

articles.title: 31 Things To Tackle The Mess Lingering Around Your House
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The content introduces several new products designed for organization and cleaning. These include a lid organizer for Tupperware, bedsheet organizers, a cable management box, a lint roller, a rubber broom, shoe storage solutions, a drain snake, a Roomba robot vacuum, airtight food containers, drawer organizers, a microwave cleaner, storage containers, a garage rack, a steam cleaner, water bottle and spice rack organizers, an under-the-sink organizer, a cleaning product called Pink Stuff, a broom organizer, a beanbag cover, a toy organizer, a Bissell Little Green Multi-Purpose Cleaner, makeup and tea bag organizers, a jewelry box, Wet & Forget cleaner, a shirt folding board, shelf dividers, a desk organizer, and a hanger stacker.

articles.title: Durability meets design
articles.summary: Vicom Enterprise launched the Honor X9d smartphone in Brunei Darussalam, highlighting its SGS Triple-resistant Premium Performance Certification and showcasing its durability through live demonstrations. The Honor X9d features ultra-tough tempered glass, IPX9K water resistance, and a 108MP camera, along with a long-lasting 8300mAh battery.

articles.title: Dunelm shoppers ditch tumble dryers for gadget that costs 18p an hour
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Dunelm is selling a new product called 'Clothes Dryer Pod' for Â£55. The product uses a PTC ceramic heating element and features a three-hour timer, aimed at providing an economical alternative to tumble dryers and central heating. Customer reviews indicate satisfaction with the drying time and overall performance.

articles.title: Tilly Norwood's movie career is dead on arrival
articles.author: John Hanscombe
articles.summary: Particle 6 Productions, a UK company, created Tilly Norwood, an AI-generated actor. The company aims for Tilly to be the next Scarlett Johansson or Natalie Portman. This introduces a new type of AI "talent" into the movie industry.

articles.title: Tilly Norwood's movie career is dead on arrival
articles.author: John Hanscombe
articles.summary: Particle 6 Productions has created Tilly Norwood, an AI-generated virtual actor. This introduction of AI "talent" is raising concern among human actors regarding job security. Eline van der Velden aims for Tilly to achieve the fame of actresses like Scarlett Johansson or Natalie Portman.

articles.title: An American in Portugal: The choice is yours
articles.author: Tricia Pimental
articles.summary: Mimo's Smoke House, originally established in Porto, has launched a new location in Braga. This new establishment, owned by JosÃ©, a Venezuelan entrepreneur, offers slow-cooked pulled pork, ribs, brisket, and smoked chicken barbecue, along with traditional American beers. The restaurant aims to provide a taste of American barbecue to those in Braga.

articles.title: Walking the talk
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: BYD showcased several vehicles at its new Zhengzhou All-Terrain Circuit. The Yangwang U8 SUV demonstrated its off-road capabilities and Emergency Float Mode, while the Yangwang U9 hypercar impressed with its speed and handling. The Fangchengbao Bao 5, Denza wagon, Seal AWD EV and Tang DM-i were also featured, demonstrating BYD's diverse range of vehicles.

articles.title: The private cleaning station: The vacuum cleaner that washes, disinfects, and dries on its own
articles.author: MEITAL SHARABI
articles.summary: A new vacuum-mop model features a smart docking station, offering boiling-water disinfection, self-drying, and odor neutralization. The product's functionality and convenience are being evaluated.

articles.title: No Handyman Needed: Take On These 37 Bath Upgrades Yourself
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several new products and services are being introduced to enhance bathroom spaces. These include wood grain tape for mirror frames, tile and stone repair kits for floors, grout pens for stained grout, peel-and-stick floor tiles for a fresh look, outlet shelves for electric toothbrushes, SnapPower GuideLights as an alternative to night-lights, rechargeable motion sensor under-cabinet lights and motion-activated toilet lights, and more. Other new products are jetted tub cleaner, Tulip shade, self-expanding shower curtain, eco-friendly chalk-like paint, 12-inch showerhead, motion-activated trash can, and black matte-steel cabinet pulls.

articles.title: Google Photos' New Update Leaves International Users Wanting More
articles.author: Paul Monckton
articles.summary: Google Photos has launched its new 'Create' tab outside of the U.S., consolidating creative tools such as collages and highlight videos.  The Create tab also offers AI-powered options like Photo to Video and Remix, but these AI features are currently unavailable to most international users, limiting them to basic creative tools.

articles.title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 review: Slim design, bright display
articles.author: Neha Saini
articles.summary: Lava recently launched the Blaze AMOLED 2 smartphone, priced at Rs 13,499, featuring a 120Hz AMOLED display, slim design, and clean Android experience. The phone is equipped with MediaTek Dimensity 7060 chipset and runs on near-stock Android 15, promising an Android 16 update. It includes a 50MP main camera and a 5,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging.

articles.title: Tesla teases mysterious new product unveiling this week
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: Tesla is teasing the unveiling of a new product on October 7th. Speculation suggests it could be a stripped-down Model Y, a new HVAC system, or the next-generation Roadster. The unveiling appears to be timed strategically, potentially to coincide with Ferrari's planned electric car announcement.

articles.title: Give Your Burger Some French Flair With Aldi's Reddit-Approved Buns
articles.author: Nikita Ephanov
articles.summary: Aldi introduced Specially Selected Croissant Buns, sold in a four-pack for around $4. These buns combine the buttery notes of a croissant with the structure of a brioche. The buns can be used for burgers, breakfast sandwiches, or ham and cheese sandwiches.

articles.title: Gauzy Has It, But The Risks Are Too High Except For The Most Speculative (NASDAQ:GAUZ)
articles.author: Quipus Capital
articles.summary: Gauzy (NASDAQ:GAUZ) develops and manufactures light-sensitive films and materials, as well as cameras and ADAS systems. The company demonstrates growth, global sales, and good incremental margins.

articles.title: Polaroid makes quick pix in under a minute
articles.author: Mike Rivkin
articles.summary: Polaroid introduced the Land Camera Model 95 in 1948, pioneering instant photography. In 1972, Polaroid launched the FX-70, a breakthrough instant camera featuring a single-lens reflex system, automatic exposure, and a convenient film cartridge, ultimately selling over one million units.

articles.title: Amazon unveils new Echos and Scribe models
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Amazon introduced new devices. Xbox increased its Game Pass prices. Google announced a new home speaker device.

articles.title: Businesses must brace for AI moment of truth
articles.author: Lucio Ribeiro
articles.summary: TBWA has launched an AI visibility service designed to ensure brands are visible and accurately represented in Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT. This service addresses the 'AI Moment of Truth' (AiMOT), where customers turn to AI for answers before traditional search or purchase decisions. The offering aims to help brands maintain credibility and influence customer trust in this new AI-driven landscape.

articles.title: Achieving Unbelievable Success at 19: A Young Entrepreneur's Journey
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Moziah Bridges launched Bee's Knees Custom Suits when he was 9 years old. He started by designing and sewing bow ties, identifying a lack of stylish, affordable options. He leveraged social media and word-of-mouth marketing to build his customer base.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Tri Fold launching October 2025
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Tri Fold, a tri-foldable smartphone, expected to debut at the APEC Summit. The device features a unique three-part foldable design, a 200-megapixel camera, and is priced between $3000 and $3500.

articles.title: AI Actors: When Artificial Intelligence Takes the Screen!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The article highlights the rise of hyperrealistic AI voices and the advancements in AI voice synthesis technology. Companies like 11Labs, TTSOPENAI, and Google with its Aistudio are pioneering accessible interfaces, enabling users to generate realistic voices with nuanced intonation and customizable styles. These advancements offer reduced costs, increased scalability, and greater creative control for content creators and businesses.

articles.title: Home Bargains' Â£3.99 buy will save you Â£100s on a new winter wardrobe
articles.author: TV Reporter
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling a 'Home Solutions Lint Remover' for Â£3.99, designed to remove lint, fuzz, and pet hair from clothing and upholstery. The battery-operated device features a lint collection chamber and a safety lock cover, aiming to keep clothes looking fresh with minimal effort.

articles.title: What is Vani, Zoho's new visual collaboration platform to take on Google Workspace?
articles.author: Karan Mahadik
articles.summary: Zoho has launched Vani, an AI-powered workplace collaboration platform designed for modern teams, offering features like infinite whiteboards, mind maps, and integrated video meetings. The platform aims to compete with foreign players in the workplace productivity sector. Zoho also launched Arattai, an instant messaging app, which has seen significant downloads and daily active users.

articles.title: The Ulanzi MA38 MagLock Phone Stand Is A Pocket-Sized Mini Tripod And Camera Grip
articles.author: Mark Sparrow
articles.summary: Ulanzi has launched the MA38 MagLock Phone Stand, a versatile pocket-sized gadget that functions as a tripod, grip, magnetic holder, and selfie stick. Priced at $55.99, it's available through Amazon and the Ulanzi online store and boasts features like Snap Mode, Mantis Mode, Phone Stand mode, Handheld mode, and Tripod Mode, along with compatibility with Arca-Swiss quick-release plates and a 360-degree swivel head.

articles.title: Jim Rossman: Streaming TV: Signing up for your first subscription service
articles.author: Jim Rossman
articles.summary: Netflix offers subscription plans, including a cheaper ad-supported plan for $7.99 per month, a standard plan for $17.99 per month, and a 4K streaming plan for $24.99. Amazon Prime customers can access Prime Video as part of their Prime membership.

articles.title: Save Â£56 on 'holy grail' LancÃ´me serum that leaves skin 'bouncy and smooth'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: LancÃ´me's Advanced GÃ©nifique Youth Activating Serum is available at a discounted price at LookFantastic. The serum, formulated with hyaluronic acid, targets signs of aging and boosts radiance, with users reporting improvements in skin texture and hydration. Alternative serums from EstÃ©e Lauder and No7 are also mentioned.

articles.title: I spill all the time and this $100 Bissell cleaner saves my floors every time
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: The Bissell Little Green Portable Multi-Purpose Cleaner, known for removing stains from surfaces like carpets and car interiors, is currently on sale during Amazon's October Prime Day event. The device works by scrubbing and suctioning grime after being filled with a water and cleaning solution mixture. Amazon is also offering deals on Bissell vacuums and cleaners during the event.

articles.title: 7 Best New Bath & Body Works Items Hitting Shelves This October â€” Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has launched several new holiday-inspired products, including the Fresh Cinnamon Rolls candle, White Barn Cactus Blossom Dryer Sheets, Winter Citrus Wreath Foaming Hand Soap, Cozy Vanilla Bourbon Fine Fragrance Mist, Honey Glaze Lip Oil, 'Tis The Season PocketBac Hand Sanitizer and 'Tis The Season concentrated room spray. These products feature various scents and formulations designed for the holiday season.

articles.title: 33 Purchases So Smart, You'll Feel Like The Shopping Version Of Einstein
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer, featuring liposome capsules that release a vitamin C and niacinamide formula. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with glycerin, aloe, and salicylic acid. Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream with Q10 to plump, firm, and moisturize skin.

articles.title: 24 Products With Magical Results
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Catrice launched "Instant Awake" under-eye brightener with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Mielle released Rosemary Mint strengthening oil with biotin and essential oils. E.l.f Cosmetics introduced Lash Xtndr tubing mascara.

articles.title: Tecno Spark Slim Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Tecno officially announced the Tecno Spark Slim on September 02, 2025. This budget smartphone features a 5160 mAh battery with 45W wired and 10W reverse wired charging, a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a Mediatek Helio G200 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 50MP main camera. The phone runs on Android 15 + HIOS 15 and is available in Slim White and Cool Black colors, with prices starting at P10,499.00.

articles.title: 33 Organizers That'll Be A Dream Come True For Clutter
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of organizational products designed to declutter and maximize space within the home. These range from closet organizers like Wonder Hangers and shoe organizers, to kitchen solutions like a silverware sorter and bakeware rack, to general storage containers and organizers. These are aimed at introducing new or update existing solutions to make home organization easier and more efficient.

articles.title: Mahindra to launch Bolero and Neo Facelift in India tomorrow
articles.author: Sunita
articles.summary: Mahindra & Mahindra is set to launch facelift versions of Bolero and Bolero Neo in India. The updated SUVs are expected to have a new face, updated interior, new alloys, and feature updates. Mechanically, they will be powered by a 1.5-litre, three-cylinder diesel engine with slight variations in power output between the two models.

articles.title: If You're Tired Of TikTok Products, I'm Sorry To Tell You That These 36 Products Are Actually Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara that uses lightweight tubing technology to wrap around lashes and give them a natural-looking, smudge-proof extension. Kuumba Made, known for its luxury scents at ridiculously affordable prices, introduced a Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a lightweight color-adapting formula for concealing and brightening dark circles under eyes.

articles.title: Rite Foods Unveils Bigi Flex Sausage Roll With More Beef, Exciting Taste
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: Rite Foods Limited has launched Bigi Flex Sausage Roll, a new snack product with more beef and unique taste, targeting Gen Z and young adults. The company aims to offer a satisfying and high-quality on-the-go snack, reinforcing its commitment to consumer satisfaction.

articles.title: Ann Summers' advent calendars saves up to Â£131 with 'very satisfying results'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Ann Summers is launching three different sexy advent calendars: 12 Nights of Exploration, 12 Nights of Seduction, and 12 Nights of Temptation. These calendars offer twelve treats each, including vibrators, lubricants, and accessories, providing a fun and intimate festive experience. The Lovehoney and We-Vibe brands also offer similar advent calendars.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: South Jersey native launches lamb products at Wegmans
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Jaclyn Oyola, a South Jersey native, is launching her lamb products at Wegmans stores. This initiative aims to shift the perception of lamb within American cuisine. Oyola's entrepreneurial drive is rooted in her family's business experience.

articles.title: Mini to Matte: Lipsticks You'll Love
articles.summary: The company introduces a pack of 10 hydrating, long-lasting mini lipsticks with a soft-matte finish, alongside a multipurpose matte tint for lips and cheeks. They also offer Paan-Tastic wine red lipstick with a luxe matte finish, a high-pigment liquid lip stain that is waterproof, and a smooth, creamy lipstick with long wear. A transfer-proof matte lipstick with Vitamin E in Ruby Red is also available.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Price In India, Release Date, Specifications, Design, Colors, Camera: All Latest Leaks
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its new flagship phone, the OnePlus 15, globally, with a potential India launch on November 13. The OnePlus 15 will have a square-shaped rear camera module, and it is expected to feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Elite processor, a 1.5K display with a 165Hz refresh rate, a 7500 mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and a triple 50-megapixel camera setup and its price may range between Rs 65,000 and Rs 75,000 in India.

articles.title: Top 25 Target Finds You'll Want All To Yourself
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Energizer is offering a charger compatible with NiMH rechargeable AA and AAA batteries. Cync features smart lightbulbs with various color options controllable via smartphone and Alexa. Additionally, a cat food cover is available with three built-in sizes to keep food fresh.

articles.title: What is Zoho Vani? The new AI-powered Made-in-India app gaining popularity, it can be used for free with...
articles.author: support@india.com
articles.summary: Software company Zoho recently launched Vani, a new AI-powered visual collaboration platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses. The platform includes tools like whiteboards, flowcharts, and video calls, and offers AI-powered content creation. Zoho Vani is priced at $5 per month for global users and â‚¹240 per month in India, with a free basic version also available.

articles.title: Hundreds line up in NY to get â€˜free caps, coffee' from tech company. It's not Apple or Google
articles.author: Trisha Sengupta
articles.summary: Anthropic organized a marketing event in New York to promote its AI assistant product, Claude. The event featured free coffee and branded caps, attracting a large crowd and positive social media attention to introduce the AI assistant.

articles.title: We're all going to die â€” soonish!
articles.author: Maureen Dowd
articles.summary: Grok AI has introduced new AI companions named Ani and Valentine. Ani is designed in an anime style and Valentine is a hunky male companion. Grok also launched 'Imagine' feature, which allows users to turn a photo into a video.

articles.title: Outgrown the fridge: popular cafe to launch second store on the Border
articles.author: Chelsea Wilson
articles.summary: An individual is focusing on building a new business with new products, suggesting an upcoming product launch or service introduction.

articles.title: Washing machines with in built heater and WiFi for convenient laundry care: Top 8 picks with smart features and more
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: LG, Godrej, Bosch, Panasonic, and Samsung offer washing machines with in-built heaters and WiFi, providing features such as hygiene, speed, and smart control. These appliances include innovations like AI Ecobubble, Hygiene Steam, and smart connectivity, enhancing fabric care, energy efficiency, and user convenience.

articles.title: 37 Solutions To Obnoxious Adult Problems
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a lightweight formula with hyaluronic acid and shea butter designed to reduce dark circles. I Dew Care launched a dry shampoo powder designed to revive limp and greasy hair, absorbing oil, sweat, and dirt.

articles.title: Shower mould and mildew vanished in minutes due to 1 item â€” no scrubbing needed
articles.author: Chanelle Georgina
articles.summary: Astonish Mould and Mildew Blaster is a cleaning product designed to remove mould and mildew without scrubbing. It is available at major supermarkets like Asda, Tesco, Wilko, and Dunelm, and promises to prevent the return of mould with regular use.

articles.title: Will artificial intelligence help consumers save money or cost them more?
articles.author: File/AP
articles.summary: CarEdge claims to negotiate the best car prices using AI, while BidCompareAI helps homeowners compare contractor bids. Delta Air Lines faces scrutiny for its AI price-setting technology, which predicts individual customer's willingness to pay for premium products. These examples demonstrate the introduction and application of AI in various services.
